EmailTemplate.name: Business partnership opportunity (1561560430.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Business partnership opportunity (1561560430.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Lynn,
I dropped by a few weeks ago and we spoke briefly.
I am interested in doing business with Ispa and wanted to have another conversation about how we can partner.
Would you be available for a brief phone call say next week Tuesday July 2nd at 2pm?
In the meantime, please check out our website (to have a look at our product offering)
https://www.grandandtoy.com/ <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]>
Best regards,
Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
